name: Travelodge Tunbridge Wells

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed here on 3 occasions now and disagree with some of the previous reviews. The hotel is in a great location and is just a short walk from the town centre. The rooms are what you would expect from a 3 star hotel, and have all the facilities you need, admitedly the TVs are a bit out of date, but still work ! We can't fault the Italian food in the restaurant and they serve a nice breakfast also. We used to stay at the nearby Royal Wells Hotel, but started coming here to escape the bad traffic noise you get there and lack of customer service.
reviews.title: We like it here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The price for this hotel was very good but that is the one and only good thing.
reviews.title: A Last Resort

reviews.text: The rooms were basic but that is what we expected however our room was dirty and not cleaned during our 4 day stay. We felt it was that bad we cut short our mini holiday and left early after 3 days.
reviews.title: Disgusting !

reviews.text: The towels were only changed once without the need to go to reception.
reviews.title: The New Wellington
Horrific !
reviews.text: The noise from the builders who were renovating the place was very bad starting from 8am and there was a congregation of staff and builders blocking the entrance whist smoking.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Superb Wedding Arrangements

aka: Travelodge Tunbridge Wells Hotel Royal Tunbridge Wells
